ncmdsuCommonEntry.name: ncmdsuCommonEntry
ncmdsuCommonEntry.description: An entry in the ncmdsu information table.

ncmdsuConfigEntry.name: ncmdsuConfigEntry
ncmdsuConfigEntry.description: An entry in the ncmdsu Configuration table.

ncmdsuNIDConfigIndex.name: ncmdsuNIDConfigIndex
ncmdsuNIDConfigIndex.description: This variable indicates the node id value of the node.

ncmdsubus.name: ncmdsubus
ncmdsubus.description: The ncmdsu bus type for Port.

ncmdsuPortChannel.name: ncmdsuPortChannel
ncmdsuPortChannel.description: This variable indicates the channel assignment for the ncmdsu for the port.

ncmdsuPortConfiguration.name: ncmdsuPortConfiguration
ncmdsuPortConfiguration.description: This variable indicates the configuration bits for port. The configuration can be set by setting the relevant bit to 1 and reset by setting the relevant bit to zero. Bit Value Name Description 0 set the ncmdsu port configuration to zero 0 1 64k set uses 8bits of data/64kbps. 1 2 LEN set enable loop code and loop commands 2 4 INV set invert the channelized data 3 8 SCR set to scramble channelized data. 4 16 CLK1 DTE transmit clock select bits 5 32 CLK2 DTE transmit clock select bits 6 64 TU set port as a timing unit 7 128 ALM set if DIU has to report alarms to SAM.

ncmcsushelf.name: ncmcsushelf
ncmcsushelf.description: This variable indicates the csu shelf associated with the ncmdsu port.

ncmcsuslot.name: ncmcsuslot
ncmcsuslot.description: This variable indicates the csu slot associated with the ncmdsu port.

ncmdsuAlarmEnable.name: ncmdsuAlarmEnable
ncmdsuAlarmEnable.description: This variable indicates whether the alarm is enabled or disabled for ncmdsu.

ncmdsuLosLead.name: ncmdsuLosLead
ncmdsuLosLead.description: This variable indicates the DTE lead bits for port. The DTE leads can be set by setting the relevant bit to 1 and reset by setting the relevant bit to zero. Bit Value Name Description 0 set the ncmdsu port configuration to zero 0 1 DTR set uses DTR 1 2 RTS set uses RTS 2 4 DSR set uses DSR 3 8 CTS set uses CTS 4 16 DCD set uses DCD 5 32 LOS use both bits: bits set to use for alarm 6 64 LOS 0 = Disable LOS detect, 1=use RTS , 2 = DTR 7 128 DDSMode set for 56k DDS .

ncmdsuTimingSource.name: ncmdsuTimingSource
ncmdsuTimingSource.description: This variable indicates the T1 timing source for ncmdsu.

ncmdsuDTESpeed.name: ncmdsuDTESpeed
ncmdsuDTESpeed.description: This variable indicates DTE Speed control and speeds 38.4k or below holds good for the DIU2131 card type.

ncmdsustatEntry.name: ncmdsustatEntry
ncmdsustatEntry.description: An entry in the ncm dsu stat table.

ncmdsuNIDstatIndex.name: ncmdsuNIDstatIndex
ncmdsuNIDstatIndex.description: This object specifies the node id of the node.

ncmdsuPortLowbattery.name: ncmdsuPortLowbattery
ncmdsuPortLowbattery.description: The ncmdsu Lowbattery status for Port.

ncmdsuPortLOSstatus.name: ncmdsuPortLOSstatus
ncmdsuPortLOSstatus.description: The ncmdsu LOS status for Port.

ncmdsuPortblockerrorcounter.name: ncmdsuPortblockerrorcounter
ncmdsuPortblockerrorcounter.description: The number of block errors produced on port.

ncmdsuPortTestSeconds.name: ncmdsuPortTestSeconds
ncmdsuPortTestSeconds.description: The number of errors produced by a test on port.

ncmdsuPortLeadStatus1.name: ncmdsuPortLeadStatus1
ncmdsuPortLeadStatus1.description: This variable indicates the Lead Status (part 1) of the port. The various bit positions are: Bit Value Name 0 1 DTR (1 = on; 0 = off) 1 2 RTS 2 4 DSR 3 8 CTS 4 16 DCD 5 32 TXD 6 64 RXD 7 128 Lead status available bit.

ncmdsuPortLeadStatus2.name: ncmdsuPortLeadStatus2
ncmdsuPortLeadStatus2.description: This variable indicates the Lead Status (part 2) of the port.The lead status2 is bit mapped. The various bit positions are: BIT Value Name 0 0 no-loop 0 1 local-loop 1 2 remote-loop 2 4 test-mode.

ncmdbuPrimaryLineStatus.name: ncmdbuPrimaryLineStatus
ncmdbuPrimaryLineStatus.description: This variable indicates the Primary Line Status of the ncmdbu.

ncmdbuLineStatus.name: ncmdbuLineStatus
ncmdbuLineStatus.description: This variable indicates the ncmdbu Line Status of the ncmdbu.

ncmdbuSwitchBy.name: ncmdbuSwitchBy
ncmdbuSwitchBy.description: This variable indicates the cause of the ncmdbu switching.

ncmdbuReceivedCode.name: ncmdbuReceivedCode
ncmdbuReceivedCode.description: This variable indicates the ncmdbu received code in hex.

ncmdsuPortTestResults.name: ncmdsuPortTestResults
ncmdsuPortTestResults.description: The number of errors produced by a test on port .

ncmdsuPortDiagStatus.name: ncmdsuPortDiagStatus
ncmdsuPortDiagStatus.description: This variable indicates the Diagnostic Status of the port. The various bit positions are: Bit Value Name 0 1 Reserved 1 2 Reserved 2 4 Reserved 3 8 Sending Test Code 4 16 Sending loopdown code 5 32 Sending loopup code 6 64 far end looped 7 128 Near end looped.

ncmddsMainConfigEntry.name: ncmddsMainConfigEntry
ncmddsMainConfigEntry.description: An entry in the ncmdds Main Configuration table.

ncmddsNIDMainConfigIndex.name: ncmddsNIDMainConfigIndex
ncmddsNIDMainConfigIndex.description: This variable indicates the node id value of the node.

ncmddsdsubus.name: ncmddsdsubus
ncmddsdsubus.description: The ncmdsu bus type for Port.

ncmddsPortChannel.name: ncmddsPortChannel
ncmddsPortChannel.description: This variable indicates the channel assignment for the ncmdsu for the port.

ncmddsPortConfiguration.name: ncmddsPortConfiguration
ncmddsPortConfiguration.description: This variable indicates the configuration bits for port. The configuration can be set by setting the relevant bit to 1 and reset by setting the relevant bit to zero. Bit Value Name Description 0 set the ncmdsu port configuration to zero 0 1 64k set uses 8bits of data/64kbps. 1 2 LEN set enable loop code and loop commands 2 4 INV set invert the channelized data 3 8 SCR set to scramble channelized data. 4 16 CLK1 DTE transmit clock select bits 5 32 CLK2 DTE transmit clock select bits 6 64 TU set port as a timing unit 7 128 ALM set if DIU has to report alarms to SAM.

ncmddscsushelf.name: ncmddscsushelf
ncmddscsushelf.description: This variable indicates the csu shelf associated with the ncmdsu port.

ncmddscsuslot.name: ncmddscsuslot
ncmddscsuslot.description: This variable indicates the csu slot associated with the ncmdsu port.

ncmddsLosLead.name: ncmddsLosLead
ncmddsLosLead.description: This variable indicates the DTE lead bits for port. The DTE leads can be set by setting the relevant bit to 1 and reset by setting the relevant bit to zero. Bit Value Name Description 0 set the ncmdsu port configuration to zero 0 1 DTR set uses DTR 1 2 RTS set uses RTS 2 4 DSR set uses DSR 3 8 CTS set uses CTS 4 16 DCD set uses DCD 5 32 LOS use both bits: bits set to use for alarm 6 64 LOS 0 = Disable LOS detect, 1=use RTS , 2 = DTR 7 128 DDSMode set for 56k DDS .

ncmddsConfigEntry.name: ncmddsConfigEntry
ncmddsConfigEntry.description: An entry in the ncmdds Configuration table.

ncmddsNIDConfigIndex.name: ncmddsNIDConfigIndex
ncmddsNIDConfigIndex.description: This variable specifies the node id.

ncmddsConfigLineIndex.name: ncmddsConfigLineIndex
ncmddsConfigLineIndex.description: This variable specifies the Line index.

ncmddsPortLoopEnable.name: ncmddsPortLoopEnable
ncmddsPortLoopEnable.description: This variable indicates the loop enable bits for port. The loop enable can be set by setting the relevant bit to 1 and reset by setting the relevant bit to zero. Bit Value Description 0 no-loop 0 1 enable ncmdds loop 1 2 enable v54 loop 2 4 enable ft1 loop 3 8 enable verilink loop 4 16 5 32 6 64 7 128 .

ncmddsPortReceiveLoopCode.name: ncmddsPortReceiveLoopCode
ncmddsPortReceiveLoopCode.description: This variable indicates the Receive ncmdds loop code of the port 1.

ncmddsPortRemoteLoopCode.name: ncmddsPortRemoteLoopCode
ncmddsPortRemoteLoopCode.description: This variable indicates the Receive ncmdds loop code of the port.

ncmddsPortAlarmEnable.name: ncmddsPortAlarmEnable
ncmddsPortAlarmEnable.description: This variable indicates the Alarm enable which is bit mapped of the port. BIT Value Description 0 0 no-loop 0 1 alarm-on-loop 1 2 alarm-on-test 3 both

ncmddsPortAlarmClearDelayTime.name: ncmddsPortAlarmClearDelayTime
ncmddsPortAlarmClearDelayTime.description: This variable indicates the Alarmcleardelaytime of the port.

ncmddsPortAbnormalStationCodeThreshold.name: ncmddsPortAbnormalStationCodeThreshold
ncmddsPortAbnormalStationCodeThreshold.description: This variable indicates the AbnormalStationCodethreshold of the port.

ncmddsPortControlModeIdleThreshold.name: ncmddsPortControlModeIdleThreshold
ncmddsPortControlModeIdleThreshold.description: This variable indicates the ControlModeIdlethreshold of the port.

ncmddsPortMuxOutofSyncThreshold.name: ncmddsPortMuxOutofSyncThreshold
ncmddsPortMuxOutofSyncThreshold.description: This variable indicates the MuxoutofSyncthreshold of the port.

ncmddsPortUnAssignedMuxChannelThreshold.name: ncmddsPortUnAssignedMuxChannelThreshold
ncmddsPortUnAssignedMuxChannelThreshold.description: This variable indicates the UnassignedMuxChannelthreshold of the port.

ncmddsPortGroup1Codes.name: ncmddsPortGroup1Codes
ncmddsPortGroup1Codes.description: This variable indicates the port1Group1ncmddsCodes of the port.

ncmddsPort56KStatus.name: ncmddsPort56KStatus
ncmddsPort56KStatus.description: This variable indicates the 56K ncmdds Status of the port. The various bit positions are: 0 Abnormal Station code(1 = Yes, 0 = No) 1 Control Mode Idle 2 Mux-Out-of-Sync 3 Unassigned Mux Chan 4 Group 1 ncmdds Codes Test Test 5 Test in Progress { 0 } Verilink {0} 511 6 Test in Progress { 0 } {1} 7 ncmdds mode enabled

ncmddsPortReceived56KCode.name: ncmddsPortReceived56KCode
ncmddsPortReceived56KCode.description: This variable specifies the received 56K ncmdds code.Some specitic values indicate the specific testing error. Value Testing Error 1 UMC 2 TIP 3 TA 4 MA 5 RC 6 BL 7 LBE 8 FEV 9 ASC 10 OOS 11 CMI 12 TC

ncmddsmode.name: ncmddsmode
ncmddsmode.description: This variable specifies the mode of ncmdds.

ncmddsLatchingLoopbackType.name: ncmddsLatchingLoopbackType
ncmddsLatchingLoopbackType.description: This variable specifies the latching loop up type of dds.

ncmddsLatchingLoopbackDevNo.name: ncmddsLatchingLoopbackDevNo
ncmddsLatchingLoopbackDevNo.description: This variable specifies the device number to receive code. Range is 0 to 7, where 0 is the first device. Used only for DS0-Data Port loopback option of Latching Loopback Type Object. No signifiance right now.

ncmdbuMainConfigTable.description: The ncm dbu Main Configuration table.

ncmdbuMainConfigEntry.description: An entry in the ncm dbu Main Configuration table.

ncmdbuConfigEntry.name: ncmdbuConfigEntry
ncmdbuConfigEntry.description: An entry in the ncmdbu Configuration table.

ncmdbuNIDConfigIndex.name: ncmdbuNIDConfigIndex
ncmdbuNIDConfigIndex.description: This variable specifies the node id.

ncmdbuAllOnesSwitchOverTime.name: ncmdbuAllOnesSwitchOverTime
ncmdbuAllOnesSwitchOverTime.description: This variable indicates the all ones duration in seconds for the ncmdbu.

ncmdbuSwitchOnBERThresholdExceeded.name: ncmdbuSwitchOnBERThresholdExceeded
ncmdbuSwitchOnBERThresholdExceeded.description: This variable indicates whether the ncmdbu is switched on for BER Threshold exceeded.

ncmdbuDialBackupMode.name: ncmdbuDialBackupMode
ncmdbuDialBackupMode.description: This variable indicates the dial backup mode for the ncmdbu.

ncmdbuBackupConnection.name: ncmdbuBackupConnection
ncmdbuBackupConnection.description: This variable indicates the whether the backup connection is activated or not.
